description: .223 Remington ammunition with 36gr JHP bullets. This bullet has been imbued by a druid's will and pollen will explode on landing, which can blind and slow.
.223 Remington ammunition with 36gr JHP bullets. This bullet has been magically shaped by an Earthshaper to turn into fragments upon impact.
.223 Remington ammunition with 36gr JHP bullets. This bullet has been imbued with fire from a Kelvinist.
.223 Remington ammunition with 36gr JHP bullets. This bullet has been imbued with ice from a Kelvinist and will try to freeze enemies in place.
.223 Remington ammunition with 36gr JHP bullets. This bullet has been imbued with lightning from a Stormshaper and will bounce from enemy to enemy.
.223 Remington ammunition with 36gr JHP bullets. This bullet has been tinkered with by a technomancer to corrupt robotics.
5.56x45mm ammunition with a 62gr FMJ bullet containing a steel penetrator. This bullet has been imbued by a druid's will and pollen will explode on landing, which can blind and slow.
5.56x45mm ammunition with a 62gr FMJ bullet containing a steel penetrator. This bullet has been magically shaped by an Earthshaper to turn into fragments upon impact.
5.56x45mm ammunition with a 62gr FMJ bullet containing a steel penetrator. This bullet has been imbued with fire from a Kelvinist.
5.56x45mm ammunition with a 62gr FMJ bullet containing a steel penetrator. This bullet has been imbued with ice from a Kelvinist and will try to freeze enemies in place.
5.56x45mm ammunition with a 62gr FMJ bullet containing a steel penetrator. This bullet has been imbued with lightning from a Stormshaper and will bounce from enemy to enemy.
5.56x45mm ammunition with a 62gr FMJ bullet containing a steel penetrator. This bullet has been tinkered with by a technomancer to corrupt robotics.
